panels.description: Shows active connections between the agents and their configured targets

targets.rawSql:
WITH agent_info AS (SELECT agents.id                                             AS agent_id,
                           connections.id                                        AS connection_id,
                           agents.name                                           AS agent_node_name,
                           agents.host                                           AS agent_host,
                           connections.name                                      AS connection_edge_name,
                           connections.description                               AS connection_edge_desc,
                           connections.connection_type                           AS connection_type,
                           connections.active                                    AS is_connected,
                           CONCAT(connections.host, ':', connections.port::text) AS connection_target,
                           agents.last_seen_at                                   as agent_last_seen_at,
                           connections.last_checked_at                           as connection_last_checked_at
                    FROM agent_connections
                             JOIN agents ON agents.id = agent_connections.agent_id
                             JOIN connections ON connections.id = agent_connections.connection_id)
SELECT agent_info.agent_node_name::text                                              AS id,
       agent_info.agent_node_name::text                                              AS source,
       agent_info.connection_target::text                                            AS target,
       CONCAT(agent_info.connection_edge_name, '-', agent_info.connection_edge_desc) AS mainstat,
       agent_info.connection_last_checked_at::text                                   as detail__connection_last_checked_at,
       CASE
           WHEN agent_info.is_connected THEN '0'
           ELSE '4'
           END                                                                       AS strokeDasharray,
       CASE
           WHEN agent_info.is_connected THEN 'green'
           ELSE 'red'
           END                                                                       AS color,
       CASE
           WHEN agent_info.is_connected THEN false
           ELSE true
           END                                                                       AS highlighted
FROM agent_info;

select name::text as id, 
      'Agent' as title, 
      concat(host) as mainstat, 
      '' as secondarystat, 
      'orange' as color,
      last_seen_at::text as detail__last_seen_at
      from agents
union
select concat(host::text, ':', port::text) as id, 
      'Target Node' as title, 
      concat(host::text, ':', port::text) as mainstat, 
      concat(connection_type::text) as secondarystat, 
      case when active then 'green' else 'red' end as color,
      last_checked_at::text as detail__last_seen_at
      from connections
;

panels.title: Connections
